list.name: Executor Added
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND state:ADDED AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Removed
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND state:REMOVED AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

list.name: Executor Blacklisted/Unblacklisted
list.query: event_type:SPARK_EXECUTOR_STATE_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND NOT state:REMOVED AND NOT state:ADDED AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_TASK_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id AND stage_id:$stage_id
event_type:SPARK_TASK_EVENT AND tag:YARN_APPLICATION AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id AND stage_id:$stage_id

panels.content:
Executor: CPU Time the executors spends actually running all tasks of the stage (including fetching shuffle data).

Executor deserialize: CPU Time taken on the executors to deserialize all tasks of the stage

targets.query: event_type:SPARK_TASK_EVENT AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id AND stage_id:$stage_id AND stage_attempt_id:$stage_attempt_id
event_type:SPARK_TASK_EVENT AND application_id:$application_id AND attempt_id:$attempt_id AND stage_id:$stage_id AND stage_attempt_id:$stage_attempt_id

panels.content:
Executor run time: Time the executors spends actually running all tasks of the stage (including fetching shuffle data)

Jvm gc time: Amount of time the JVM spent in garbage collection while executing the stage 

Executor deserialize time: Time taken on the executors to deserialize all tasks of the stage

Result serialization time: Amount of time spent serializing all tasks of the stage result
